bitfield.description: Core0 Invasive debug Activate. This is a fault tolerant bitfield that must be set 4'hA to Activate 4'b1010 - Activated others - Deactivated
Core0 Non-invasive debug Activate. This is a fault tolerant bitfield that must be set 4'hA to Activate 4'b1010 - Activated others - Deactivated
